verses.roman:
sabā lañā svarūpa gosāñi śunite vasilā
tabe sei kavi nāndī-śloka paḍilā

synonyms: sabā lañā—in the company of other devotees; svarūpa gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; śunite vasilā—sat down to hear; tabe—thereafter; sei kavi—that poet; nāndī-śloka—the introductory verse; paḍilā—read.
translation: Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī sat down with other devotees to hear the poetry, and then the poet began to read the introductory verse.
